newsitem.title: SOUTH AFRICA: S.Africa bonds recover slightly in late trade.
newsitem.headline: S.Africa bonds recover slightly in late trade.

text.p: 1425 GMT - Rand a touch weaker but keeping to narrow range as bonds strengthen after slight weakening in morning session.
* Rand last at 4.5545/75 on dollar from 4.5535/5565 late on Monday, rebuffing high of 4.5570 bid as central bank rumoured to be capping to prevent serious weakening.

* On the crosses, the rand was quoted at 0.3948/3953 against the mark, compared to Monday's close of 0.3950/3955 at 1400 GMT. Elsewhere, the rand was trading at 7.6016/6112 against sterling from 7.6900/6973 previously and at 25.2979/3366 yen from 24.9159/9500 on Monday.
* R150 recovers to 14.265 pct from Monday's 14.31 local close on institutional demand following failed assault on 14.35 percent ceiling.
* Dealers expect sideways move on Wednesday and echo market in need of fresh direction.
